name: Vigilante City - Galaxy Gopher's Pizzeria
description:
Galaxy Gopher's Pizzeria is a ready to use location for your Vigilante City and other OSR supers games. It includes stats for malfunctioning animatronics, an improvised weapon, map, descriptions, and six adventure hooks. 

All writing and artwork was created by myself and Josh Beckelhimer aka The Lone Bards.
